articles.author: Steven Railston
articles.title: Erik ten Hag's Man United selection dilemma has been solved by accident - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Harry Maguire could return to the squad against Aston Villa, but Erik ten Hag has a simple decision to make in defence.
articles.content: When Raphael Varane and Lisandro Martinez sustained injuries this month, the door opened for Harry Maguire to make a statement. Manchester United's first-choice centre-backs had been sidelined and it… [+3146 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Orme
articles.title: Man Utd news: Jim Ratcliffe's takeover hopes get boost as Casemiro successor identified - The Mirror
articles.description: The deadline for final takeover bids has come and gone with Sir Jim Ratcliffe and Sheikh Jassim bin Hamad Al Thani both still in the running to become the club’s new owners
articles.content:
Manchester United will be aiming to rubber-stamp their place in the Champions League on Sunday afternoon as they take on Aston Villa at Old Trafford. 
The Red Devils currently sit fourth in the tabl… [+2500 chars]
